yButton.message: Y Button: Refresh the current page.

bButton.message: B Button: Close the current tab.

homeButton.message: A Button: Create a new tab.

lbButton.message: Left Bumper (LB): Switch to the previous tab.

rbButton.message: Right Bumper (RB): Switch to the next tab.

ltButton.message: Left Trigger (LT): Go back in history.

rtButton.message: Right Trigger (RT): Go forward in history.

xButton.message: X Button: Duplicate the current tab.
